name: John Smith
summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of expertise in full-stack development, specializing in Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies. Proven track record of delivering scalable web applications and leading development teams.

experience.description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users. Improved system performance by 40% through database optimization. Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews. Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%.

Built full-stack web applications using Python Django and React. Developed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services. Collaborated with product team to define technical requirements. Maintained 99.9% uptime for critical production systems.
Developed responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Fixed bugs and implemented new features for existing applications. Participated in agile development process and sprint planning.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built scalable e-commerce platform using Django and React. Implemented payment processing with Stripe API.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Developed real-time collaborative task management tool. Features: real-time updates, file attachments, team collaboration.
